2.title: Psych Evaluation Reschedule
2.body: Hello Agent Cartwright, this is to remind you that your Psych Evaluation has been moved to next week on the 15th. 5pm at Room 502. Don't be late this time. -Dr. Evangeline Jackson

3.title: Catching Up
3.body: Hey Tom, let's catch up tonight at Fox's? I still owe you that drink from Shanghai.

4.title: Abigail Wright Missing Persons Case
4.body: Hdy man, I thought about what you said, and I think youre on to something. Come see my desk later.

a.title: Contrato n22
a.body: Sector: X11.  Objective: Investigate the sewers and report only to me.  Reward: 22 MCr.

1.title: wtf are you kidding me?
1.body: Are you kidding me? Why don't you change your password?  The system is entirely compromised until you correct it.  You're the sysadmin, if you're this dumb the corporation is at risk.
